snippet: The president’s spokesman said Mr. Obama would sign legislation passed by Congress aimed at blocking Russian state firms from Western financing and technology while also providing $350 million in military aid to Ukraine.
abstract: White House officials say Pres Obama is prepared to sign new round of sanctions against Russia, already struggling with ruble's collapse, that will block certain businesses from receiving Western financing and technology; bipartisan legislation also provides $350 million in arms and military equipment to Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The president’s spokesman said Mr. Obama would sign legislation passed by Congress aimed at blocking Russian state firms from Western financing and technology while also providing $350 million in military aid to Ukraine.

headline.main: Obama Signals Support for New U.S. Sanctions to Pressure Russian Economy
headline.print_headline: Obama Signals Support for New U.S. Sanctions to Pressure Russian Economy
